template.name: zfCardListAll
template.description: Usada para listar cartões em um formulário.

templates.template:
<z:cardlist id="${id}" label="${label}" var="${varName}" value="${backingBean}.${dataModel}"> <f:ajax event="beforeAdd" listener="${backingBean}.${beforeAdd}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="afterAdd" listener="${backingBean}.${afterAdd}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="beforeEdit" listener="${backingBean}.${beforeEdit}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="afterEdit" listener="${backingBean}.${afterEdit}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="beforeInsert" listener="${backingBean}.${beforeInsert}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="afterInsert" listener="${backingBean}.${afterInsert}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="beforeUpdate" listener="${backingBean}.${beforeUpdate}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="afterUpdate" listener="${backingBean}.${afterUpdate}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="beforeDelete" listener="${backingBean}.${beforeDelete}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="afterDelete" listener="${backingBean}.${afterDelete}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="beforeCancel" listener="${backingBean}.${beforeCancel}(${varName})"/> <f:ajax event="afterCancel" listener="${backingBean}.${afterCancel}(${varName})"/>
<z:sortOptions> <z:sortOption label="${labelOfSortOption}" sortExpression="${propertyOfVar} ASC"/> </z:sortOptions>
<z:headerActions> <z:define name="add-action"/> </z:headerActions>
<z:card id="${idCard}" template="${templateCard}" />
<z:cardActions> <z:define name="edit-action"/> <z:define name="delete-action"/> </z:cardActions>
<z:inlineForm id="${idInlineForm}"> <z:card id="${idCardInLine}" template="${tempalteCardInLine}"/> </z:inlineForm>
<z:inlineFormActions> <z:define name="save-action"/> <z:define name="cancel-action"/> </z:inlineFormActions> </z:cardlist>
